snippet.title: Game Gear Longplay [010] Phantasy Star Gaiden (Part 1 of 2)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Valis77

The story takes place on a colony founded by the legendary Alisa Landeel and chronologically fits between Phantasy Star and Phantasy Star II, precisely 471 years of distance between each other.Few years after the first game, Alisa settled in Copto, but an evil being known as Kaburon dominates/controls this newly found planet. Alisa temporarily defeats him by sealing him away in his own castle. She then sees a vision of the future. In this vision, Kaburon escapes and causes havoc. Alisa then decides to put a risky plan into motion....
Four centuries later, in AW813, an orphan named Minina of the town Tedo tells her friend Alec that she found the Light Pendant in a nearby cave. After discussing the significance of this find, the two learn that Alec's father Morg has been taken captive during his search for the Laconian weapons by the Daidalus bandits. After discovering a secret scroll, Minina learns that she is the descendant of the colony's founder, Alisa.
During their journey, they meet up with Doromu (a dwarf of the forest) and a Lars (Alisa's android). The game takes them all across the world into various caves and distant villages. Alec and Minina's main goal is to find the sacred Laconian weapons in order to defeat the evil force ruining the land.
Near the end of the game, Alec and Minina discover Alisa in a hidden cave under cryonic sleep. After awaking her, they team up to take on Kaburon. Once he is defeated, the game ends with Alisa informing you that even though Kaburon is dead, "A greater evil is awakening. Not in Copto.." and she's needed, to save the Algol system once more.

Man are those random encounters Worse then Dragon Quest. -
